title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.74 - Liability for valuation in excess of $25 limited to 10 days from date parcel checked
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.74 - Liability for valuation in excess of $25 limited to 10 days from date parcel checked

State Regulations

The Port Authority will be liable for the amount of
value declared in excess of $25 for a period of 10 days only from the date on
which the parcel is checked. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.74

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
